website_summaries.verdict: Workers who are on their feet all day, every day, say these shoes are comfortable, cushioning, and supportive. Just don't expect them to last too long.
pros: A favorite among restaurant servers, bartenders, postal carriers, and retail workers
No foot fatigue or slipping in greasy kitchen
cons: Not a lot of arch support
Start coming apart after a few months

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes.. I work at a restaurant in the Kitchen so I am on my feet a ton. I had payless shoes and after the first day of work I couldn't walk my husband had to carry me to the bedroom. My heel always hurt... I work 37-45 hours a week. I also have a 10 month old so I am constantly on my feet. These shoes have stopped my heel pain and I can walk fine. The memory foam feels amazing. I fell in love with these shoes
customer_reviews.author: Kelsea Murphy

customer_reviews.title: My shoe fell apart!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I had to edit my review of the sketchers. After 4 months they are coming apart at the seems. I never had a shoe come apart at the stitching.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki's 2 Cents

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable & lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: I wear these for hospital cafeteria work. They are extremely comfortable and very light weight. Sketchers has a beefier model that I have bought before which would be good for standing on your feet for 10 hr days. Right now these are being used for 4/5 hr shifts. No break in time what so ever. Comfortable right out of box.
customer_reviews.author: K.NTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not For Heavy Duty Purposes
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the fact that I’m giving this a 3 star review. While they are comfortable and do not hurt your feet when breaking them in, they do not last long which is not so good for how much they cost. I work in a place where I’m on my feet 10 hours a day 5 days a week and my right shoe sole is starting to come off. I bought these back in January of 2018 and it is now February. I’m looking for heavy duty comfortable working shoes that will last much longer. I had high hopes for these shoes since they have a 4.4 out of 5 stars. They’re great! Just not for heavy duty purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only for part-time work!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is instantly comfortable when you put it on but it does not have enough support for anything more than a 4-6 hour shift. I work 11 hour shifts and average between 12,000 - 15,000 steps and after 4 hours of wearing these shoes my feet began to ache. In my old work Skechers (Liv SR-BRAWNY) my feet never ached until the shoe itself started to wear out after about 8 months. When are the designers at Skechers going to realize that memory foam does not work in a true "for Work" shoes. Memory foam does not provide the needed support for working on hard concrete floors.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: NOT worth it if you work 10+ hours and move around
customer_reviews.text: These will NOT hold up to 10 your shifts where you are constantly walking or running! Do not invest in them if you are on your feet and moving often. Ive had them less than a month and a half and the right insole started to crumble inside under the ball of my foot. There is now a hole there that goes all the way through the insole. They also weren't all that comfortable. Granted I have arthritis so my feet hurt sooner than some, my feet started to hurt 2 hours into the job while wearing These.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Foot pillows...
customer_reviews.text: I love these work/play/exercise shoes. After owning a slightly different version of Skechers, I decided to try these with the flatter, less articulated sole. These are equally as comfortable and well made as my other Skechers' shoes. The gel sole in this model is removable, so anyone who prefers their own orthotics will have no problem fitting them into this model. They appear to be as equally durable as my other Skechers (link above). With a leather upper and non-skid sole, these are safe and comfort plus all day long. These Skechers have no safety toes, just in case someone wanted to know. Thank you, Skechers, for making the most comfortable and durable all around shoes on the planet.
customer_reviews.author: AskAlthea

customer_reviews.title: Ten thumbs up!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They arrived a couple of hours before I needed to wear them to start a new job in a grocery store Deli requiring none-slip shoes. I have very wide feet across the toes and have a terrible time finding shoes that fit--most often I buy men's shoes. I put these on and went to work. The Skechers were amazingly supportive and comfortable (and didn't slip once!) and got me through the worst work experience of my life. They are also affordable. I have ordered 2 casual pairs of Skechers now to try.
customer_reviews.author: cheriwinkle

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Eyelet on left shoe broke first time I wore them. Didn't even make it to lunchtime. Return process would just add to my aggravation. $50 down the tubes. Thought Sketchers was a good brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: These cause severe sciatica pain!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was having bad pains in my lower back every time I worked, I tried everything, pain patches, creams, pills, even got a brace for leg that is supposed to help sciatica, I was so upset not figuring out what the cause was, well today I decided that after work if I was still in pain, I would go to emergency room, but decided to wear old cheap work shoes in place of these, guess what, not a bit of pain!!! It was these shoes that was causing me so much pain!!!! Do not buy them!!!! My cheap Walmart work shoes are better!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Thurmond

customer_reviews.title: Not so good for mail delivery.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered these shoes at least 5 times. I deliver mail for a living so I walk anywhere from 5-10 miles a day. These shoes are really nice the first few weeks but then i noticed my knees hurting (more than usual) Every pair I’ve bought tends to wear out on the sides of the soles. It’s very uncomfortable and I’ve never had this problem with other shoes. Recently I ordered another pair and was sent the wrong size. I think that’s my cue to try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: dranel1

customer_reviews.title: *Update*
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful shoes! *Update* Disappointed with these shoes. I do a lot of walking and standing on concrete at my job. The memory foam has worn out in the ball of my shoes. Now I have horrible blisters... By the end of the day my feet hurt so bad I can barely walk. Maybe it's just my bad luck or the amount of walking I do. Whatever it is these shoes have caused pain, blisters, and calloused feet for me. I do not recommend for people who need/want to walk a lot for work or play.
customer_reviews.author: Jerilynn Stone

customer_reviews.title: I've been wearing them for a week now and absolutely love them. The only bad thing I can say ...
customer_reviews.text: As a server/bartender, I'm on my feet constantly. I've been ordering from "shoes for crew" for the longest time, but the quality and consistency has gone downhill. I tried Danskos, but couldn't seem to get them to break in. So as I was searching the web, I came across these Sketchers. I've been wearing them for a week now and absolutely love them. The only bad thing I can say is I wish they looked a little classier under my black work slacks. But I'll take comfort instead!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad shoe for the price. Economical.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd order of this shoe. The first lasted me approximately 4 months before the sole started to separate from the bottom of the shoe. But I like them so much! I expect them to fall apart because I am outside and on my feet over 10 hours a day covering over 6 miles of walking on the average in all weather. So this little shoe held up pretty well in my opinion. I will continue to order replacements in this style as long as it is available. Good, economical work shoe investment. I put this shoe through the ringer!!!!
customer_reviews.author: idsign23

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes but...
customer_reviews.text: I actually really like these shoes. yes, they’re not the most stylish but they get the job done. I work at Wendy’s and in the kitchen area especially when we are closing, the floor will get slippery from mopping and cleaning and just all the stuff that gets thrown on the floor overtime. These are very good slip resistant shoes. One con i do have is that it takes a while to break them in, i work 9-10 hours a day and after a whole week of working in these, my feet don’t hurt after work. Just take your time with them and you’ll break them in ! i will be ordering these again
customer_reviews.author: alyia crew

customer_reviews.title: Now that I've had these for 9 months...
customer_reviews.text: I can say - Comfortable out of the gate. So, far they have held up well cosmetically - no cracks or wear to the outside of the shoe. Early last month I did have to buy gel insole supports for the inside of the shoes - my memory foam was wearing out, and my knees were starting to hurt at the end of my shifts. Once I replaced the insoles, all was right in the world again - knees stopped hurting. I average about 22+ hours a week on my feet. Because of this, I expected the insoles to wear quickly, but happy to say that everything else outside of the insoles has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Laula W.

customer_reviews.title: Cinderella’s perfect shoe
customer_reviews.text: Finally! I have super fussy feet. I stand all day, and have sciatica. I needed a work shoe that was closer to an athletic shoe without being so breathable/meshy- as what I do involves a lot of dust. My toes get gritty feeling from the dust I work around in an athletic shoe. This shoe is great. It didn’t need break in time (I don’t have time to break in shoes), it’s covered toe and construction keep the dust out (but also breathable somehow) and it’s really comfortable. I tried tons of shoes and these might be my favorite work shoe!
customer_reviews.author: L A

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves these shoes! On her feet all day.
customer_reviews.text: My wife works at Costco and is on her feet all day. She was buying cheap cross training tennis shoes and wearing them out in a matter of a few months. I decided to surprise her with a real pair of work shoes and it's made a huge difference. She's a 7 and they fit just as expected. Takes a day or two to break in enough so the laces are nice and tight. The first day out of the box they are a bit "puffy" and her heal was wanting to poke out. But after a couple days everything set into place and she's had zero issues. She loves these shoes. Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: If you have wide feet I recommend you size up
customer_reviews.text: I thought relaxed meant roomy. I normally wear 7.5 sneakers so i bought these is 7.5 but for some reason the shoe felt snug. Toes did not feel so roomy but it did not feel tight either. If you have wide feet I recommend you size up
customer_reviews.author: Aggretsuko

customer_reviews.title: Sketcher work shoes, who knew?
customer_reviews.text: I am on my feet all day at one of my jobs. I really needed shoes with support, but with non-slip. I never would have thought of Sketcher brand shoes to be work shoes. But I searched for comfortable, supportive work shoes and these Sketchers came up. They are non-slip, and they have the greatest foam lining that support my arch, my heel, and my upper foot bed. And because they are Sketchers, they still look good. I wore them for 8 hours the first time, and I did not have any hurt or achiness in feet while working or when I got home. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my feet all day and wanted some comfy shoes. Bought these because they were wide so it wouldn't pinch, non slip, and supposed to be comfortable. Worst shoes I've ever bought. Worse than Walmart brand shoes. Insert is super uncomfortable, the center of the bottom of shoes is very and weirdly narrow, making my feet feel like they're hanging off the sides of the soles. I compared the bottom of the shoe to other shoes I have and it's about 1/4 inch narrower. I tried for three days to wear them and by the third I was having aching pain up my legs.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Yes.
customer_reviews.text: Ok kids, I’ve had these shoes for about a year now, and they continue to be one of the best shoe decisions I have ever made. I work at a postal annex, so I am on my feet and running back and forth all day. I have never had a more comfortable work shoe, not even dansko. Bonus: these puppies got me through a family trip to Disney world without my feet getting tired! Would totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer.A Smith-Zempel

customer_reviews.title: Great price great fit.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect shoes for me. I have osteoarthritis and plantar facsiitus. I need something wide enough for my small but wider feet and be comfortable enough to wear. I used to buy these at Fleet Farm. They discontinued carrying them. But threw Amazon I am still able to buy them at even a better price! So bite me Fleet Farm!
customer_reviews.author: Carob

customer_reviews.title: Big bruises on my feet
customer_reviews.text: I work 5 days a week, 8 hours a day, as a cake decorator, standing the whole time. These shose are so uncomfortable, what started as small bruises that didnt hurt very much, grew into big bruises and immense foot pain in just a few weeks. These are supposed to be work shoes and this shouldn't have happened if you want something better I recommend Fila memory foam work shoes they dont last but a few months but the are way more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Very squishy.
customer_reviews.text: A little snug upon first putting it on but it’s because of all the padding (memory foam). Not too snug while wearing since the shoes adjust to your foot/weight. Had to get shoes with no mesh for nursing school and these seemed to be the best fit for not wanting to spend a fortune. They’re very comfortable. I bought insoles for these not realizing how much padding there is, so I won’t be using those with these shoes. That little tag at the beginning of the shoes on the laces is rubber so it’ll have to be cut off instead of if it was per just rip it off.
customer_reviews.author: Stormyy

customer_reviews.title: I was a sceptic, now I get it.
customer_reviews.text: I have been suffering from severe foot pain since I started working a huge concrete warehouse, walking eight hours a day. Every pair of shoes I own, including my walking Sketchers, had me limping by the end of the day. When I bought this pair, I nearly sent them straight back as they appeared to be the same as a pair I’d recently bought. I decided to try them once. I was at home taking them off that night and stopped with the realization that I hadn’t limped all day and that my feet were only mildly sore. What a difference. I need more of these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Pearls Perspective

customer_reviews.title: Lymphedema afflicted
customer_reviews.text: I just got these today and put on immediately. O.m.g! I have normal looking shoes on! I have lymphedema and for 3 years have worn crocs. I found these and the fact they have extra wide is what won me over. I loved sketchers when younger and I'm so happy to wear then again! I work in a warehouse and I was able to slide my feet right into them and tie them at the time of day I'm most swollen. To achieve designed these, thank God for you! I have since cut the slip resistant tag off. I was just too excited to try them on! I will be ordering these again!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Masterson

customer_reviews.title: Average shoes
customer_reviews.text: The slip resistance is fine, the shoes fits perfect. When Skechers went to the memory foam carp ( in most of these shoes) its like walking barefoot within a two week work period. They took out the arch support they use to be know for.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with foot related injuries or pain
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE the memory foam in these shoes! Unfortunately, they don't have arch support in them; so I'll need to buy those little arch pads that stick into the shoes. Otherwise, these shoes are fantastic. I have plantar's facitis, a bad knee, and am overweight. These shoes relieve a LOT of the pain in my lower body.
customer_reviews.author: DianaraSHERRY

customer_reviews.title: Great for food service, on feet all day
customer_reviews.text: Me teenage daughter got her first job in food service and is on her feet 8-10 hours a day. Job requires slip-resistant shoes. She started the job with short notice so we had to buy shoes at Walmart. Her feet hurt quite a bit. I ordered these and after 1 day she's so much happier. Her feet didn't hurt at all! We ordered her regular size. Will update later if they don't hold up well. If there's no update, that means they had an average life expectancy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Functional  Good support.  Non-slip
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a new banquet server job that requires non-slip shoes. They work well, no slip and my feet are not killing me by the end of the night. They do tie up Laces are shorter so no tripping. I only gave them 4 stars cause they are not very attractive. Sketchers makes such cute shoes. I would hope they could make more attractive work shoes as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Literally not made like they used to
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what happened to these shoes in the last two years, but the quality has tanked. I had a pair when I was still in school, and they lasted until I moved up and across the country. Even then, they were fine. I just couldn't pack a lot and left them. Fast forward to now, and I recommended these to my girlfriend and bought another pair for myself. Hers have a bare minimum of two holes in each shoe, and the soles of mine are slowly showing signs of separating from the actual body. What the hell? Did we both just happen to get defects? Has quality plummeted? I'm honestly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Pluto

customer_reviews.title: Comfort  and Safety all rolled up in two
customer_reviews.text: These work shoes are beyond my expectations. I work in a Bakery Enviroment...grease, water and icing end up on the floors, making it slick most of the time. There is no getting around it in my full time environment. I have had these phenomenal Sketchers on my feet every morning, for a week now. I step into a memory foam pillows that molds to my wider feet. Step by step...and hustling through my days with super tread soles as well, hats off to Sketchers! Y'all should be sold out! Well done@ I will be back.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Like them very much, had to go up a half size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my usual size and had to return it and get a half size larger. I think it has something to do with all the cushioning. But once I got the right size, I was very pleased. I’m a hospital nurse so I’m always on the hunt for the elusive perfect shoe. So far, this one is very comfortable all shift, looks nice and seems sturdily made.
customer_reviews.author: sistrmoon

customer_reviews.title: Size and comfort is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got a size 7 for these shoes and it fits perfectly! Comfortable and it's been about 1 month and it hasn't fallen apart or anything yet. It really does help u from slipping when you're working in a restaurant with slippery/oily floors. I haven't slipped once since I wore these shoes. For scale, I usually get a size 8/37-39 for heels or wedges, 7 for regular boots, and I'm wearing size 8 for winter boots. I guess it really depends on the style and cut of the shoes hence the different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Chevy

customer_reviews.title: I have many pairs of Skecher tennis shoes but these are the most comfortable ones I have worn
customer_reviews.text: I have only been wearing them a week but they have so much support. I am in catering and spend a lot of time on my feet. I have many pairs of Skecher tennis shoes but these are the most comfortable ones I have worn. I did buy a half size up from reading other reviews and they fit perfect. As one review I read they do make my feet look smaller. In this one week I have worked many hours on my feet and my feet did not hurt or ache. They do squeak as some mentioned in their comments but I will take the squeak since they are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Changed my daughter's outlook on working.
customer_reviews.text: My 17 y/o daughter started her first job as a waitress in a national chain restaurant. After the first week, she told me she wasn't sure she could continue working there. She said she loved waitressing, the people were all great, and the tips were amazing, but her feet hurt so bad after a 6-hour shift, she was in tears. Amazon to the rescue! After a quick google search of "best shoes for waitresses," I found these. Now after my daughter's 6-hour shift, she is ready to go dancing with her boyfriend. She now has a rejuvenated work ethic and cannot wait for her next shift!
customer_reviews.author: Jim307

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but not super slip resistant
customer_reviews.text: Ive had horrible foot pain for months. I have RA attacking my toes and feet. Also, a few months ago I injured my knee (ACL tear) so I've been walking funny to. I work on my feet all day as a restaurant manager and these finally gave me relief. I'm so happy. However they are not very slip proof despite them labeled slip resistant. I did a split on the wet floor hurting myself the other day. This would get a 5 star but I gave it a three for safety reasons.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Not very slip resistant
customer_reviews.text: Well they are comfortable. I do give them that. I did need to still wear my inserts though. I just have bad feet. My biggest complaint is they aren’t very skip resistant. I find myself sliding several times a day. If they did a better job on that I think they would be pretty close to wonderful. I guess at the end of the day we will always choose comfort over safety
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: These were great for custom insoles and custom AFO (ankle foot orthotic)
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. I have had several pairs of skechers nonslip shoes. These were great for custom insoles and custom AFO (ankle foot orthotic). Wide and laces almost all the way down the shoe, which allows extra width and room in the toes. But they were not like the others. The "trickle" soft stride was cheaper, and now I know why. While the sole appears to be like the other skechers soft stride shoes, they have the non slip on the bottom as a separate piece glued into the sole! Separated within a single month of wear. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: bittybear

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really uncomfortable. They also run small. I wear a size 7 and ordered a 7.5 to give me a little extra room. I should have ordered one size up instead of 1/2 size up. My toes almost touch the end of the shoe. Also the left shoe is defective. I have no problems with my feet turning in or out, but the left shoe turns in so bad that it hurts my heel and the outside of my foot. When I wake up the next morning I can barely walk. Unfortunately it’s too late for me to return these. I started wearing my stiff doc martins and I barely have any pain at all
customer_reviews.author: Mail

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Hold Up for Long
customer_reviews.text: The width in these shoes was good, but I didn't care for the cheap looking leather material, though that was not really an issue. I just wanted a good supporting work shoe that was slip resistant. these felt okay for about 4 weeks, then my feet were terribly sore after 6 hours. Wal-mart shoes I've bought have done better for much cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn E. Floyd

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are incredibly comfortable and provide much support
customer_reviews.text: I am a mail carrier and have been wearing these exact shoes for a couple years, now. I always purchased them at Fleet Farm before, until they stopped carrying my size. Not only did Amazon have the same shoes, they were cheaper! Yeah! These shoes are incredibly comfortable and provide much support. I wear them for 12 or more hours a day. They are Skechers, so they do wear out a bit quicker than some other brands, but you can't beat them for comfort and support.
customer_reviews.author: gsdlady

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I tried out 3 different shoes during nursing school and these were the only ones that felt comfortable during my entire12-hour clinical shifts. They’re super grippy on the bottom and are so comfy inside (I’ve even wiped them down and took them hiking a couple times). The only downside is that they are a bit heavy, but it wasn’t something that I had a problem with.
customer_reviews.author: Beth I.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for those in the service industry.  My feet have never been happier.
customer_reviews.text: VERY COMFORTABLE, a bit bulky looking but i'm on my feet for hours and walking a lot while delivering pizza and my feet were killing me prior to using these shoes. no matter what inserts i used. My feet still ache at times but these shoes have saved me. Prior to using these shoes, i'd wake up in the morning and barely be able to walk because the bottom of my feet were so bruised.I'd definitely suggest these for anyone who is on their feet a lot.
customer_reviews.author: JENN

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the description
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed! Bought these shoes for a new job, they have received rave reviews, what a crock. These are way narrow, (yes, I ordered x-wide) and the supplier won't let a replacement for a larger size be shipped. Don't buy from this supplier. I had to wait until the item was returned which delayed my new shoes causing me pain during my first days of a new job.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wide width?
customer_reviews.text: Let's start by saying I really love these shoes. I work as a chef and I'm on my feet for long days with tons of moving. The shoes are comfortable and they fit great, but I ordered them as wide width and they were labeled as extra wide width. I don't usually wear wide width shoes but I recently hurt my toe so I wanted the extra room, I do not feel like I got it. If i NEEDED then to be wide they might not have fit. However they do for my feet and it is really nice for them not to be sore at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Saindon

customer_reviews.title: They hurt
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because of favorable reviews from hospitality employees. What a disappointment. I had to go back to my old shoes because these are terrible. No arch support and my feet are sore after a single shift. Now I have to buy new shoes again.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Pennell

customer_reviews.title: Pretty disappointing...
customer_reviews.text: I work on my feet ALL DAY and while I love the comfort of these shoes, the quality of the workmanship is sorely lacking. This is the 3rd pair of these same shoes I’ve bought and they’re falling apart in less than a month. The sole of the shoe is pulling away from the actual bed of the shoe. I’m going to have to glue it back together. I can’t afford another pair right now, but the next shoes will be a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Great work shoes for standing all day
customer_reviews.text: I had to write this review as soon as I have worn my new work shoes this week. I first asked one of my coworkers for their opinion before buying and I do not regret it 🙌🏽. These have been the most comfortable fitting relax shoes I have bought for my money since I have been working my current job awhile. I have been through alot of shoes and so far these shoes have held me all day with no complaints as I normally would be. I love the way the memory foam makes my feet feel. Soft as a pillow on my feet. My feet feel alot happier 🙌🏽🙌🏽😁
customer_reviews.author: Jímena

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a year w high usage
customer_reviews.text: Great grip, very comfortable... But I am definitely the talk of my department at work with how much they squeak on the hospital floors. Frequently cleaned and waxed, so I imagine that's the cause. Don't wear them anyplace else, so I do not know if they squeak everywhere. EDIT: As of today, June 16 2019, these shoes are kaput. My average daily steps for the last year was likely around 10,000-15,000 with some days reaching highs of 20,000... I am fairly impressed with them. They were comfortable yet squeaky the entire year.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy

customer_reviews.title: What a rip off..
customer_reviews.text: Pretty irritated. These shoes are a complete rip off. I’ve been on the lookout for a good pair of work shoes with good reviews, and I found these and thought I was saved. While they do work great and my sciatic pain does not flare up in them, I have literally worn them for three shifts and the stitching is already giving way. I read the reviews before purchasing and figured I would take a chance since overall they had positive reviews and high stars. So disappointed and feeling ripped off as these are not cheap. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kait Murray

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic. Could not recommend more - 8 stars
customer_reviews.text: My friend in Colombia works 8 - 14 hours per day on cement floor. These are a miracle for her. After 2 years of daily use they broke down and regular shoes were killing her feet. Then she got the new pair and within a few days was pain free. Thank you Skechers!!!! Note: I have NOT been paid to do this review.
customer_reviews.author: Roka2

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart after lessthen a month.
customer_reviews.text: Highly disappointed. I wear these shoes only 2x a week for 6hr a day. I got them for clinical for nursing school. They've lasted from 9/17-10/8. I've worn them only 8 days! And already the shoelace holders are ripping off! Complete garbage for the price you pay.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoe But...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this shoe for a friend who works in a nursing home & they really enjoyed them. They said the shoes were comfortable, stylish, &, more importantly, offered a secure grip. I deducted a star b/c this is the second pair I’ve had to buy in the last 6 months, so durability could be an issue. Will see how long the 2nd pair last.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Henry

customer_reviews.title: Apparently work shoes are made small.
customer_reviews.text: I only ever wear sketchers and ordered these for when I started at a new place on July 20th. I’m 5 days past the return window so unfortunately I’m stuck with them. I didn’t try them on since I ordered the same size I’ve always worn in sketchers and these are so small it almost like they’ve been mislabeled or something. Wishing I’d not been so trusting and tried them on earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Really did not like how the shoes fit
customer_reviews.text: They really hurt my feet I don’t like the way they fit, and I don’t recommend buying these it’s almost like what a high heel would feel like and I don’t wear high heels. I’m going to go to a sketcher store and see if I can find a shoe like it that is more flat . I figured for wearing them for about a week I would break them in No, I can’t wait to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Niki T.

customer_reviews.title: Bought for My Daughter
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just started working her first job at McDonalds. She was constantly complaining about her feet hurting so I had to teach her the first rule of working, comfortable shoes. She says they are great, and her feet do not hurt when she gets off of work. Would recommend these shoes to anyone who is on their feet all day at work.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Arevalo

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 7 and a 7.5 not knowing exactly what I'd need. My tennis shoes are 7.5 but the 7's fit me better and I will be keeping them. They are instantly comfortable, roomy, not clunky looking given they are work shoes. I like the non-skid, water resistant. Now, I'm hoping they make insole replacements.... I'd like more support and the fist think to go is the insoles.
customer_reviews.author: murph

customer_reviews.title: Returned the first pair...wrong size
customer_reviews.text: The shoes needed to be returned...they run a little smaller than I normally wear, but the seller was good to work with. The return went well and money was refunded...ordered the new shoes a half-size larger and they were perfect. I stand on my feet all day at work and have found this to be a very comfortable working shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Clementine

customer_reviews.title: Will be testing them out this winter!
customer_reviews.text: I used to manage the kitchen of a Mexican restaurant, having worked there for 17+ years. I always bought my non-skid black leather-ish shoes at a "famous" national shoe chain, but they no longer carry the ones I've worn since 1994, I was extremely happy to find these, and I'll feel fairly safe on Colorado Springs' snowy and icy sidewalks for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah F. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Want a GREAT pair of shoes?? Buy these!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my daughter as she was complaining about her feet and back hurting soooo bad! She had a major sale the next day after receiving them. She called me that night to rave about how her back and feet did not hurt and she felt great! She calls me every other day to rave how great these shoes are and thanks me over and over for them! She says that she has leftover energy after working and her family is sooo amazed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: these shoes are very comfortable and may help in your individual situation
customer_reviews.text: I work on concrete floors 8 hours a day with Morton's Neuroma, bunions & hammer toe on the right foot; bone spurs on the left heel. I bought these based on the bartender's testimony. "Holy Grail," as she mentioned, is not what I would call them. I went from Sketcher's steel-toe shoes to these. Went from ankle & foot pain to hip joint pain. Tried several inserts from gel to memory foam. None have worked for me. YET! Don't get me wrong...these shoes are very comfortable and may help in your individual situation. They are well-made and Sketcher quality. So don't hesitate to try them.
customer_reviews.author: Maikegu

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE SHOES
customer_reviews.text: I'm a nurse on my feet all day running around and I have tried all types of shoes and spent a lot of money. These are by far the best shoes I have worn with great support. All the reviews were on target and it was one of the reasons I purchased them. Can't beat the price. They are practical looking but in all black look fine. Definitely will buy again when these wear out (but so far after 5 months they look brand new)
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!!! Go up one size .
customer_reviews.text: I had ingrown toenail surgery plus I am a hairdresser that stands on my feet all day. I went up a size because it fit to tight for my toes with all the padding and support. My feet did not hurt. Excellent support! Highly recommend this shoes if you stand or walk a lot!!! I normally wear size 10 . 11 fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Buying another pair - public school teacher.
customer_reviews.text: Fit is perfect,wide enough, etc. bed of shoe is giving, but I also add insoles to my shoes. Looks like a ski boot more than a work shoe. Kept feet warm and I wore then to work in the yard. Giving these to my daughter (ER @hospital) and buying another pair for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice style
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to use for work, but so far have found they are a bit narrow in the front and bother my big toe on the right. They don’t fit as well as the other styles of sketchers I’m used to. The shoe is sturdy, definitely slip resistant and looks good. I just need a teeny bit more room in the front right shoe. If I ordered a half size larger they would be too big. I have worn this brand for years and never had this problem before.
customer_reviews.author: Joni

customer_reviews.title: Not the same!
customer_reviews.text: IVE WORN THESE FOR YEARS AND MY LAST PAOR THEY ARE NOT BETTER THEN MY WORN OUT PAIR! YOU CAN FEEL THE UNDERNEATH OF THEFOOT BED LIKE THERE ARE HOLE IN THE SOLE THROUGH THE PAD! I DONT WANT TO PUT IN MORE PADDING BECASE I NEED THE ROOM.AL THE REVIEWS AND THESE SHOES ARE AT LEAST 3 YEARS OLD. YOU CHANGED SOMETHING!
customer_reviews.author: damian ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great for work if on feet all day!
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying these for my mom for 2 years now. She works in food service, on her feet 10+ hours at a time and these are the only shoes she will wear to work! A touch wider than normal shoes (like most skechers) so she can wear thicker socks in winter and in summer she has room in case her feet swell a little. Non slip, great arch support; my mom replaces about every 6mo as she works 6 days a week.
customer_reviews.author: H.Kim21

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I work on concrete floors and these are very comfortable! If I had anything bad to say about them I’d say I wish there was a tiny bit more room in the toes. I purchased these twice and on the second pair, the slight raised rubber padding at the tip of the right inner sole, which is for comfort, is back just a little too far, creating pressure on the joints of my toes. It makes them sore after a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Chef in my 50's, on my feet at least 50 hours a week...LOVE THESE SHOES!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the MOST comfortable shoes I have ever worked in! For the past 5 years, I have just been rotating 2 or 3 different shoes/boots every week trying to avoid foot pain. I WISH i would have bought these years ago! I've been working 70 hour weeks for the past 2 weeks since I've had them with NO pain whatsoever since the first day I wore them. They are more non skid than my older shoes but I still have to be careful on very wet floors around the dish pit, etc. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mismatched.
customer_reviews.text: Very odd thing, I received the shoes and didn’t pay too much attention what they looked like just that they fit perfectly. However, I later saw that I got two completely different shoes! No way to return them because I tossed the box they came in and I can’t figure out a way to make a complaint on here. My only options were to either return or write a review. 4 stars because they are very comfortable shoes, just wish I could trade one and get 2 of the same pair.
customer_reviews.author: Concepcion

customer_reviews.title: My feet are screaming "THANK YOU"!
customer_reviews.text: I have very flat feet and have always preferred to go bare foot or wear Skechers tennis shoes as they've been the most comfortable. I was so happy to discover they've made work shoes with anti slip soles...perfect for my new job in the restaurant industry. These shoes have way more cushion and shock absorption than their everyday tennis shoes! I'm so pleased and plan on getting a second pair for outside of work!
customer_reviews.author: Lia Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have had multiple problems with my foot. I bought these shoes hoping that they would help. I ended up having surgery on my foot and my Achilles. These were the only shoes I could wear while I’m healing. They stretched enough to accommodate the swelling and felt fairly comfortable all things considered.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for working on your feet all day!
customer_reviews.text: I have several foot issues and these are fantastic! Because they are leather, they stretch enough to accommodate my bunions. They offer wide width, good support, are comfortable and slip resistant (a requirement for my job.) The price is reasonable for the quality, I know they last since I have owned Skechers for several years, and sometimes you can find them on sale. Thank you for a quality product at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: sandb365

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfort while working in the restaurant for long hours. They hold up well too
customer_reviews.text: I would never order shoes before but I usually by this brand but my work schedule kept me from going to the store. Perfect fit and same as in store only kind of shoes I want to wear working in the restaurant for 10 to 12 hours a day and my feet don’t hurt. Only negative was the delay in delivery, it could have been becouse we kept getting snow but that was frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Dj

customer_reviews.title: The shoes feel like your feet are being hug by a pillow
customer_reviews.text: I am a manager at a fast food restaurant, so I am on my feet 8hrs. a day. The shoes feel like your feet are being hug by a pillow, super cushionie, with a good deal of support. They have taken most of my foot pain away. They are not a magic cure all for foot pain but they help a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Axelsen

customer_reviews.title: If you’re on your feet all day these are the shoes for you.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were a gift for my daughter. She is on her feet all day long at a doctors office and she loves these shoes. There was no “break in” time. They were comfortable right out of the box. They have helped with her ankle, heel and calf pain. They have slip resent soles. Good investment on comfort. Plus the shoes are cute and feminine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: I been trying to look for comfortable sneakers for my new post office job because my feet would be killing me after only a few hours and i kept hearing to try Skechers. So i bought these hoping for relief but it's not that great. I read the reviews and seen how highly people spoke, even from nurses doing longer shifts and honestly it doesn't give me that much relief as i thought it would. My feet still hurt after only working 5 hours. So I'm on the search for something else i guess. I would return these but i already worn them and don't think i can.
customer_reviews.author: Laya

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: When they arrived in didn't realize I got wide width but I'm glad they are because they fit great. I have been trying to find a comfortable pair of slip resistant shoes for 2 years and these so far will be my reorder shoe I'll stick with when I need another pair. I'm trying now to find them in men's! I work in a oil roast floor 13 plus hours a day and they have been great!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Stands up to standing up all day
customer_reviews.text: I work retail and am on my feet for hours at a time. I purchased these shoes, pulled out the insole and replaced them with orthotics in time for the grueling holiday season. I got through the holidays without needing a podiatrist! Shoes are holding up well too. Would definetly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony R De Marco

customer_reviews.title: Best Restaurant Safe Foot Gear!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my 10th pair of these shoes! I broke my foot years ago and have had a fear of rebreaking it ever since. This shoes are comfy, slip resistant and solid! I have been a server/bartender for 20+ years and these are one of the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned
customer_reviews.author: Follow me on IG @itsnanatoyou

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love these...
customer_reviews.text: I like the way they look. BUT my toes hurt so bad every day in these!! I’m an 8.5 in some shoes and a 9 in others. I ordered the 9 and it’s too small. I tried them out at work for a week hoping they just needed some time. My toes hurt for hours after I take them off still. :( I love the shoe in every other way. Great slip resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Logan

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend is on her all day during work and these shoes are her best, makes her happy and when she's happy I'm happy. Great shoe
customer_reviews.author: Bill Duke

customer_reviews.title: Not the shoes I normally getdont think they were real brand shoe
customer_reviews.text: Not happy shoes had no foam support they fit so tight in my toe are my nail broke off im a size 9 and I got a 10 and there is a true problem w these shoes
customer_reviews.author: CECELIA

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable work shoe my daughter has owned
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a gift for my daughter who needed a non-slip black shoe for her work. She said these are the most comfortable work shoe she has owned. She commented positively on the style. She said it is hard to find a all black work safety shoe that is not ugly.
customer_reviews.author: T. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable at all!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes do not fit relaxed fit. They are also very stiff even with memory foam. They hurt my feet within an hour into my shift but since i wore them to work they now have stuff on the bottom of them so im out $50 for a pair of shoes i hate. They make my feet so uncomfortable. No ventilation in them either so your feet will sweat in them.
customer_reviews.author: luv2swim915

customer_reviews.title: always check shoe size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 7 1/2 and wore them to break them in for a day or 2. They always hurt my feet. I have always purchased Sketchers and have never had an issue. After 2 day my feet hurt so bad and couldn't understand why. That was when after removing the shoes I looked at the size on the inside and they weren't what I ordered, with the box saying the right size and the shoe being 1/2 size smaller. Always check when you order shoes on line.....things do get mixed up!!
customer_reviews.author: Mat

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy and surprised at how awesome these shoes are! I waitress and bartend so I'm on my feet all day and these are the BEST shoes I've ever had. The non-slip is awesome in the kitchen and even on wet floors! I've had them for almost two months now and are still great! I also walk to work so I put some serious wear and tear on my shoes. And these are still almost like new! Very tough shoes! I will be buying them again!
customer_reviews.author: jlynnc

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: So I have wide feet and I'm on my feet for 8+ hours a day and these shoes are amazing. They are super comfortable and fit my feet well. I like them so much that I've already bought a second pair. I will say the one downside is you can't put any additional sole supports in the shoe since it already has memory foam but otherwise, these shoes are great. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ramblings From This Chick

customer_reviews.title: Saved my feet
customer_reviews.text: These are great for standing all day. I work at McDonald's and used to get really bad foot pain by the end of the day, and it would last for days. I'd have to lay down and put up my feet for an hour, or else every step I took would hurt. With these, my feet are a little tired by the end of an 8 hour shift but I'm good to go after testing for a little. No more foot pain for me.
customer_reviews.author: annette

customer_reviews.title: Glass-climbing Wonder Treads!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these, as the tread on them is enough to practically climb glass like Spiderman! The toebox was fine and accurate to width, but the heel was a bit too wide for me and they slipped a little in the heel. Can't have that, so I had to send them back. If your heels tend to be on the wider side, these will be great for you, and you will slip on Nothing!
customer_reviews.author: K. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: My mom is happy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom, she works in retail and stands for 99% of her day. She’s 66, so she needs the support for feet and knees and this was it. She tells me that she loves it and when she walks or stand for long period of time it doesn’t bother her feet nor knees. She’s happy, so I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Zee

customer_reviews.title: Spend more on a better quality shoe.
customer_reviews.text: This did immense damage to my feet (I now have plantar fasciitis, I never did before this) as well as pain up my legs into my hips. I am on my feet at work up to 14 hours a day and after wearing these shoes, I was just about crippled at the end of the day. Do not buy these shoes if you spend your day on your feet. You will regret it. I just did an order for a shoe with better support and can't wait to throw these out.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: May not be good enough for virgin feet
customer_reviews.text: On the floor for 12 hour clinicals. For someone who have never been exposed to staying on my feet all day, these did not help the discomfort of my feet. My past work has been at a desk. By the third hour, pain started creeping up. I wore these for 3 weeks before judging them. I'll have to try a different shoe now. I'm 5'4, 165 lbs, so maybe my weight has something to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bee Blast

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great! I walk 5 miles a day on concrete at my job. I’ve had these shoes now for four months and they are still going strong. They are as comfortable to wear today as they were the first day. I would highly recommend this product for comfort and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Amezcua

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and incredible comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I have big bunyons and often a Womens 11 wont fit me but these do. They are more comfortable than my slippers. I bought them for a big show where I will be on my feet for days straight. I haven't really put them to test yet but so far I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were wider than expected. Typically a B width is perfect, but these fit more like a C width. Also, they were described as a running shoe. The shoe had zero support in the sole, arch and overall construction. They are described as having a removable lining, but if you take the lining out, you are exposing the actual seaming of the shoe. Not the quality I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Work shoes
customer_reviews.text: i bought these for my new job as a lube tech at a dealership. They have awesome slip protection against wet floors and engine oil. The first day they were super comfy, but the second day they felt tight against my toes. Maybe it's just breaking in, but overall pretty happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Silent til I speak

customer_reviews.title: I like'em
customer_reviews.text: My local shoe store is out of stock most of the time of this shoe. So glad I found these on Amazon. I walk all day long full time . Casino housekeeper. These shoes last about 9 months. Love the roomy toe box. My last pair came apart between sole and uppers unexpectedly and had to wrap black duct tape around them till my new ones came. So glad.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

product_meta.title: Skechers Work Sure Track - Trickel
product_meta.description:
* Feel that you are in control of your day and ready to conquer any task that comes your way in practical comfort.
 * Low-cut design with SKECHERS Relaxed Fit® has a generous silhouette that accommodates your feet for a custom fit.
 * Traditional lace-up closure for an adjustable and custom fit.
 * Supple leather upper. 
 * Padded tongue and collar for added protection and support.
 * Ventilated lining for ultimate comfort.
 * Memory foam cushioned removable footbed for all-day comfort.
 * Shock-absorbing midsole.
 * Pull tab at the heel for easy on and off .
 * Slip-Resistant nitrile rubber traction outsole.
 * EH Safe rated ASTM F2413-05.
 * Slip Resistant sole tested with ASTM F1677-96 Mark II standards to meet or exceed a .5 coefficient even on wet and oily surfaces.
 * Imported.
 * Measurements: *  Weight: 11 oz
   
   
 * Product measurements were taken using size 9, width B - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size.
 * Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Soft fabric shoe lining. Padded collar and tongue
